title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Press Add for the associated editors.

a. Enable multiple selection.

c. Mark the default entry in the associated editors list (default).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)

Also:

f. The dialog needs a width hint.

g. Investigate and resolve why the File editors Preference page grows in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same.

Fixes already implemented:

a. Multiple selection enabled.

c. Default entry marking (default).

f. Width hint added for the dialog.

Fixes to be released.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)

Released fixes for a, c, f, and g.
OB: The OK button is enabled even when no selection is made.
EB: The OK button should be disabled when no selection is made.
SR:
1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Press the Add button to add associated editors.
3. Verify that multiple selection is enabled.
4. Verify that the default entry in the associated editors list is marked (default).
5. Verify that the dialog has a width hint.
6. Verify why the File editors Preference page grows in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same.
7. Check that the OK button is disabled when no selection is made.
